General.Name: Shanghai SK Automation Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai SK Automation Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of intelligent manufacturing equipment for new energy vehicles and fuel vehicles. It offers automotive chassis system and hydrogen energy equipment, intelligent manufacturing data, and software products. The company also offers battery module and PACK production line, cell factory logistics conveyor line, auto chassis production line, motor electric control production line, and non-standard custom equipment; and testing technology, industrial manufacturing data, and simulation and virtual reality technology. In addition, it exports its products. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
